item.title: Equities Rally Not Driven By Trump: Manulife Strategist
World Premiere of BOSTON set for One Boston Day, April 15, 2017
item.description: [PR Newswire] - BOSTON, Jan. 27, 2017 /PRNewswire/ -- John Hancock Financial the title sponsor of BOSTON, the first feature-length documentary film about the history of the iconic Boston Marathon, announced today it will partner with the Boston Athletic Association and WBZ-TV to sponsor the World Premiere of the film on April 15, 2017, at the Boch Center Wang Theatre. The special performance of the Boston Pops Esplanade Orchestra is underwritten by Owsley Brown Presents, in partnership with Worth Miller Productions. Additional sponsors of the Premiere include Clif Bar and Company and Poland Spring.

item.title: Manulife U.S. Monthly High Income Fund Celebrates Three Year Anniversary with Morningstar's 4-Star Rating
item.description: [CNW Group] - Manulife U.S. Monthly High Income Fund Celebrates Three Year Anniversary with Morningstar's 4-Star Rating

item.title: Manulife U.S. Monthly High Income Fund Celebrates Three Year Anniversary with Morningstar's 4-Star Rating
item.description: [PR Newswire] - TORONTO, Jan. 27, 2017 /CNW/ - Manulife Investments today announced the three year Morningstar Rating for its Manulife U.S. Monthly High Income Fund. This Fund, launched on December 24, 2013 has achieved a 4-Star rating1 from Morningstar, has over $1.1 billion in assets under management and has achieved top-quartile performance in Morningstar's Global Neutral balanced category with over 840 competitors, since inception. The popularity of the Manulife Monthly High Income Fund2 and the long-term success of the investment strategy made it an obvious choice to extend to the U.S. market in 2013," said Alan Wicks, Senior Managing Director and Senior Portfolio Manager, Manulife Asset Management Limited.

item.title: Research Reports Initiated on Insurance Stocks Industrial Alliance Insurance and Financial Services, Power Corp of Canada, Power Financial, and Manulife Financial
John Hancock Investments launches Market Intelligence app for iPad
item.description: [PR Newswire] - BOSTON, Jan. 19, 2017 /PRNewswire/ -- John Hancock Investments today announced that Market Intelligence, an award-winning guide to the financial markets, is now available on iPad. Over the past two years, Market Intelligence has become a trusted market resource for financial advisors and other intermediaries. John Hancock Investments' multimanager approach to investing provides its dedicated in-house research team with a unique advantage: the ability to leverage the best market insight from its global network of more than 75 specialized asset managers and investment partners.

item.title: John Hancock Announces New Chairperson of the John Hancock Group of Funds Board of Trustees
item.description: [PR Newswire] - BOSTON, Jan. 13, 2017 /PRNewswire/ -- We are pleased to announce that Hassell H. McClellan has succeeded James M. Oates as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees. Mr. McClellan brings a wealth of experience to his new position, having been a professor of finance and policy and associate dean at Boston College's Wallace E. Carroll School of Management and a director of both public and privately held companies. Mr. Oates has served as Chairperson of the Board of the John Hancock Group of Funds with distinction since 2005, providing steady guidance during a period of phenomenal growth and challenges.

item.title: Manulife Employees in Canada Receive $10,000 Per Year in Mental Health Benefits
item.description: [PR Newswire] - WATERLOO, ON, Jan. 11, 2017 /CNW/ - Under its redesigned benefits plan, Manulife employees will now receive a mental health support benefit up to $10,000 per person per year, including family members. This amount represents among the highest mental health benefits offered by Canadian employers. According to the Canadian Mental Health Association, an estimated one in five Canadians will experience a mental illness in their lifetime.
